# Suparank

> AI-powered SEO content automation. Write, optimize, and publish blog posts directly from Claude, ChatGPT, or Cursor using Model Context Protocol (MCP).

## What We Do

Suparank is an MCP tool that connects AI assistants to SEO content workflows. Run `npx suparank` to research keywords, write optimized articles, and publish to WordPress or Ghostâ€”all from your AI chat.

## Quick Links

- [Homepage](https://suparank.io): Features, pricing, and getting started
- [Blog](https://suparank.io/blog): 31 SEO guides and tutorials
- [Dashboard](https://app.suparank.io): Project management
- [Documentation](https://suparank.io/blog/mcp-tools-automated-blog-writing-setup-guide): Setup guide

## Key Features

- 19 MCP tools for end-to-end content workflows
- Direct WordPress and Ghost CMS publishing
- Keyword research and topical authority planning
- Brand voice training for consistent content
- Image generation with fal.ai integration

## Free SEO Tools

11 free SEO audit tools that run in Claude Code, Cursor, and AI coding assistants.

- [All Tools](https://suparank.io/tools): Complete tools directory
- [Free SEO Audit](https://suparank.io/tools/full-seo-audit): Comprehensive 50+ point site analysis
- [On-Page SEO Checker](https://suparank.io/tools/on-page-seo-checker): Title tags, meta, headings
- [Accessibility Checker](https://suparank.io/tools/accessibility-checker): WCAG 2.2 compliance
- [LLMs.txt Generator](https://suparank.io/tools/llms-txt-generator): AI-friendly content for LLM crawlers
- [Robots.txt Generator](https://suparank.io/tools/robots-txt-generator): Search crawler rules
- [Technical SEO Audit](https://suparank.io/tools/technical-seo-audit): Crawlability & indexing
- [Schema Generator](https://suparank.io/tools/schema-markup-generator): JSON-LD structured data
- [Core Web Vitals](https://suparank.io/tools/core-web-vitals-checker): LCP, INP, CLS metrics
- [Meta Tag Generator](https://suparank.io/tools/meta-tag-generator): Title, OG, Twitter Cards
- [Internal Link Checker](https://suparank.io/tools/internal-link-checker): Link structure analysis
- [Alt Text Checker](https://suparank.io/tools/alt-text-checker): Image accessibility

**Install:** `curl -fsSL https://suparank.io/install | bash`

## For Developers

- Install: `npx suparank setup`
- GitHub: https://github.com/suparank
- MCP Package: https://github.com/Suparank/Suparank-MCP
- WordPress Plugin: https://github.com/Suparank/Suparank-WordPress-Plugin
